question: What is the win to loss ratio of Sri Lanka national cricket team in t20i format in 2019?(Answer in decimal form.)
predicted_answer:
The win to loss ratio of the Sri Lanka national cricket team in T20I format in 2019 was 2.0.

Explanation:

In the provided timeline, there are five entries for the Sri Lanka national cricket team in the year 2019. To determine the win to loss ratio of the team in T20I format in 2019, we need to look at the "t20i_record" field, which represents the number of wins and losses in T20I matches.

At the start of the year, the t20i\_record was "55/56", which means that the team had 55 wins and 56 losses in T20I matches prior to 2019.

At the end of the year, the t20i\_record was "79/92", which means that the team had 79 wins and 92 losses in T20I matches up to that point.

To calculate the win to loss ratio for the year 2019, we need to look at the change in the win and loss counts from the start of the year to the end of the year. During 2019, the team had 79 - 55 = 24 wins and 92 - 56 = 36 losses in T20I matches.

Therefore, the win to loss ratio for the Sri Lanka national cricket team in T20I format in 2019 was:

24 wins / 36 losses = 2.0

Note that this represents the win to loss ratio for the year 2019 only, and not for the entire period covered by the timeline.
